p: Sequence reads were trimmed from Illumina adaptors using the TrimGalore v0.4.2 script ( https://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/trim_galore/) and paired reads were merged with FLASH v1.2.11 (Magoc and Salzberg 2011). Genomes were assembled with SPAdes v3.13.0, and mis-assemblies corrected using Pilon v1.22 (Bankevich et al. 2012; Walker et al. 2014).
